entry.source: The knight in red armor is once again{F801}trying to summon the Gozutennou... or,{F801}rather, the Overlord Baal. He's been{F801}spotted at a {F804,5}building south of the Tennozu{F801}shelters.{F804,0} This is an official quest from the{F801}Hunter Association to slay the {F804,5}Red Knight.{F804,0}{F801}
